[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Water-valley.jpg|thumb|300px|The Water-valley in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Water-valley''' was a gentle valley in [[the Shire]].

==History==
The Water-valley was the valley of [[the Water]].<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 99</ref> The [[East Road]] was constructed in the wide valley, and the towns of [[Hobbiton]], [[Bywater]], [[Frogmorton]] and [[Whitfurrows]] were located in it.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> [[Bilbo Baggins]] took [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] for many a long walk through the valley.<ref>{{FR|Three}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Water-valley is located on the both sides of [[the Water]].
